name: Sex Adventures - Modeling Audition
description:
A visual novel about a young woman looking for some extra cash. Everything takes a turn when she applies for a modeling job online.

Visual Novel Description

Nita is a young woman who is desperately looking for some extra money.
Fed up with her every-day life, she applies for a modeling job she found online.
Although she thinks she has no chance, she is invited to an audition the very next day.
Confident in herself, she shows up at the set time and location.
Lev, the photographer, has been waiting for her and he’s eager to see her in action.
Little does she know that he has other plans for her career.
